Package hrps.exception

This package contains the exception classes that are specially defined for the HRPS. All of the other exception classes are subclasses of HRPSException.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CancelCheckInReservationException
    When trying to cancel a CheckedInReservation.
    CheckOutGuestContactNotFoundException
    When trying to check out a non-existing guest.
    CheckOutGuestNameNotFoundException
    When trying to check out a guest whose name does not exist in system.
    DuplicateMenuItemException
    When trying to create a menu item whose name already exists in the menu.
    EmptyMenuItemDescriptionException
    When trying to create a menu item with empty description.
    EmptyMenuNameException
    When trying to create a menu item with empty name.
    HRPSException
    The super class of all the exceptions defined by HRPS program.
    IllegalBedTypeException
    This exception is thrown when the user input an illegal bed type.
    IllegalChangeOfDateException
    When trying to change a check-in/check-out date that cannot be changed (eg.
    IllegalRoomInSerializableBinaryFileException
    When trying to remove a non-existent CheckedInReservation.
    IllegalRoomTypeException
    This exception is thrown when the user input an illegal room type.
    InvalidCheckOutTimeException
    When trying to set a check-out time that is before the associated check-in time.
    InvalidDatePairException
    When trying to set a check-in time that is after the associated check-out time.
    InvalidDateTimeFormatException
    When trying to enter a date time input not in format yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm or the entered date time input does not exist (eg 2022-02-30 12:00).
    InvalidInputChoiceException
    This exception is thrown when the user enters an invalid input choice.
    InvalidOrderedMenuItemQuantityException
    When trying to enter a non-positive menu item quantity.
    InvalidPriceException
    When trying to enter a negative menu item price.
    InvalidRoomNumberFormatException
    When trying to enter a room number not in format xx-xx, where x is a decimal digit.
    InvalidRoomNumberUpdateException
    When trying to update a room number, which by policy is non-updatable.
    InvalidRoomTypeException
    When trying to enter a non-existent room type.
    InvalidStatusChangeException
    Exception thrown when a status change in reservation is invalid.
    MenuItemNotExistException
    When trying to enter a non-existent menu item's name.
    NegativeNumberException
    When trying to enter a negative number.
    RoomNumberNotExistException
    When trying to enter a non-existent room number.
